casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Torrey GRADY 179A14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 10, 2018 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Luke M. Everett, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Laws, for Grady, Torrey Dale. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of September 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of September 2018."
